title: Gronk Trade Rumors, Gruden vs. Gruden, Cowboys should trade for Beckham (Football 04/02)
description:
Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson fire up the new format for the Pick Six Podcast, breaking down the latest news from around the NFL, including the possibility of Rob Gronkowski being traded by the Patriots and Bill Belichick being miffed about Gronk's MyFace posts, the two big rules changes coming out of the owners meetings last week, whether John Elway is bluffing about the Broncos potentially drafting a quarterback at No. 5, which Gruden brother between Jay (Redskins) and Jon (Raiders) will win more games in 2018 and which landing spot is best for Odell Beckham, including why the Cowboys and Chargers could potentially make sense for the wide receiver.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
